fields.name: DataDisks
fields.description: Specifies the parameters that are used to add data disks to the virtual machines in the scale set. For more information about disks, see [About disks and VHDs for Azure virtual machines](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/virtual-machines/managed-disks-overview).

fields.name: OsDisk
fields.description: Specifies information about the operating system disk used by the virtual machines in the scale set. For more information about disks, see [About disks and VHDs for Azure virtual machines](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/virtual-machines/managed-disks-overview).
